what.title: What Information Do We Collect?
what.p: We may collect personal information that you provide to us, such as mobile device ID, geolocation, and other information related to the use of our Services. This may include the use of cookies and tracking technologies, as well as your interactions with our app.

how.title: How Do We Use Your Information?
how.p: Your information is used to provide, improve, and administer the Services, to communicate with you, and for security and fraud prevention purposes. We may also share information with third-party service providers that help us operate the Services.

location.title: Location Data
location.p: If you use location-based features in our app, we may collect and process your geolocation information. You can control or disable this in your device settings.

device.title: Mobile Device ID
device.p: We may collect and share your device's advertising ID (such as Google Advertising ID) with third-party partners, including Google AdMob, for the purpose of displaying personalized ads and analyzing app usage. Collection and use of your advertising ID for personalized advertising is based on your consent. You can manage or withdraw your consent at any time in your device's privacy settings by resetting your advertising ID or limiting ad tracking.

share.title: Do We Share Your Information?
share.p: We may share your information with third-party service providers who assist with the operation of our Services. We will not share your information for marketing purposes without your consent.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.p: You may have certain rights over your personal information, including the right to access, correct, or delete your data. You can manage your preferences in your device settings or contact us for assistance.

protect.title: How Do We Protect Your Information?
protect.p: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, or alteration.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.p: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes by updating the "last updated" date at the top of this page.
